sqlMap.statement:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SysCd) ROWNO, SysCd , SysName , SysIp , SysPort , UserId , UserPassword , SendDir , RecvDir , SftpYn , ThisMsgUseYn FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ11
UPPER(SysCd) LIKE '%' || #searchSysCd# || '%'
UPPER(SysName) LIKE '%' || #searchSysName# || '%'
) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ11
UPPER(SysCd) LIKE '%' || #searchSysCd# || '%'
UPPER(SysName) LIKE '%' || #searchSysName# || '%'

UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ11 SET SysName = #sysName#, SysIp = #sysIp#, SysPort = #sysPort#, UserId = #userId#, UserPassword = #userPassword#, SendDir = #sendDir#, RecvDir = #recvDir#, SftpYn = #sftpYn#, ThisMsgUseYn = #thisMsgUseYn#, ThisMsgAmndrID = #userid# , ThisMsgAmndHMS = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3') WHERE SysCd = #sysCd#

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ11( SysCd , SysName , SysIp , SysPort , UserId , UserPassword , SendDir , RecvDir , SftpYn , ThisMsgUseYn , ThisMsgRegsntID, ThisMsgRegiHMS , ThisMsgAmndrID , ThisMsgAmndHMS ) VALUES( #sysCd# , #sysName# , #sysIp# , #sysPort# , #userId# , #userPassword#, #sendDir# , #recvDir# , #sftpYn# , #thisMsgUseYn#, #userid#, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), #userid#, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3') )
